dcterms:description: A dataset containing strings used for training and evaluating models on in-distribution tasks, specifically with input lengths ranging from 6 to 15.
dcterms:title: In-distribution strings

dcterms:description: A dataset containing strings used for evaluating models on out-of-distribution tasks, specifically with input lengths ranging from 1 to 5 and 16 to 30.
dcterms:title: Out-of-distribution strings

dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of training and development sets used for model training, containing 1,000 input-target pairs per input length.
dcterms:title: Train/dev sets

dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of test and generalization sets used for evaluating model performance, containing 5,000 input-target pairs per input length.
dcterms:title: Test/gen sets

dcterms:description: A dataset designed for the quadratic copying task, where the output is a string that consists of the input string repeated a number of times based on its length.
dcterms:title: Quadratic copying dataset

dcterms:description: A dataset containing ascending and descending sorting tasks, where the input strings are sorted in lexicographic order.
dcterms:title: Sorting tasks dataset (ascending and descending)
